thread.title: Transport Secretary reaffirms A303 upgrade (W) - ITV News
thread.title_full: Transport Secretary reaffirms A303 upgrade | West Country (W) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Transport Secretary reaffirms A303 upgrade (W) - ITV News
text:
Play video The Government has again confirmed its commitment to upgrade the A303 to the South West. Transport Secretary Patrick McLoughlin - who said that the A358 to Taunton would also be improved - told the Conservative conference that the manifesto pledge to complete the dual carriageway link, with a tunnel at Stonehenge, would go ahead.
Last updated Mon 5 Oct 2015 Politics
